meta.title: e-commerce - Community marketplace
meta.description: A community-first multi-vendor marketplace with independent storefronts, updates, and EU-compliant checkout.

hero.title: Discover independent sellers and shop together
hero.subtitle: One payment, sub-orders per seller, bilingual support, and compliant fulfilment tailored for Poland and the EU.

marketplace.description: Browse the curated catalog across sellers and filter by categories, price, and availability.
marketplace.hint: Marketplace catalog will launch alongside the product module.

stories.description: Follow store updates and community highlights to stay in sync with new drops.
stories.hint: Store updates feed is coming soon.

contractors.description: Discover specialists open to collaborations that help stores grow faster.
contractors.hint: Contractor discovery tools are planned for the next iteration.

login.description: Access orders, messages, and moderation tools after a secure sign-in flow.
login.hint: Supabase-backed login screen will ship soon.

signup.description: Register as a buyer or seller and become part of the e-commerce community.
signup.hint: Email-verified sign-up flow is coming shortly.

admin.description: Manage catalog, orders, team members, and buyer conversations from one console.
admin.hint: Seller console with moderation and fulfilment ships in the next milestone.

stores.description: Meet independent stores, their product lines, and the teams behind them.
stores.hint: Store index and filters will go live with the catalog release.

legalPrivacy.description: Understand how we process personal data under GDPR and local regulations.
legalPrivacy.hint: Full privacy policy draft lands with the compliance milestone.

legalTerms.description: Review the platform terms, seller responsibilities, and buyer rights.
legalTerms.hint: Finalised terms will ship after legal review.

legalReturns.description: Learn about returns and complaint procedures aligned with EU directives.
legalReturns.hint: Returns workflow will launch together with orders and fulfilment.
